name: Titanium.Network.TCPSocket
summary: The TCPSocket instance returned from createTCPSocket. This object represents a socket which either listens locally on the device for connections, or connects to a remote machine.

events.name: read
events.summary: new data was read off the socket

properties.name: from
properties.summary: the reference for the socket that data was retrieved from

properties.name: data
properties.summary: a blob representing the data read, can be interpreted via toString

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Indicates a successful operation. Returns `false`.

properties.name: error
properties.summary: Error message, if any returned. May be undefined.

properties.name: code
properties.summary:
Error code.
If the error was generated by the operating system, that system's error value
is used. Otherwise, this value will be -1.

methods.name: connect
methods.summary: connect the scocket to a TCP server

methods.name: listen
methods.summary: set up the socket to receive connections

methods.name: write
methods.summary: write data to the socket, if the mode is WRITE_MODE or READ_WRITE_MODE

parameters.name: data
parameters.summary: either a string or blob object representing the data to be transferred

parameters.name: sendTo
parameters.summary: the socket reference to send the data to.  Default is to send to all connected sockets

properties.name: hostName
properties.summary: the host name to connect to. Must be INADDR_ANY or an identifier for the local device in order to listen

properties.name: isValid
properties.summary: whether or not the socket is valid

properties.name: mode
properties.summary: the socket's mode

properties.name: port
properties.summary: the port to connect/listen on

properties.name: stripTerminator
properties.summary: strip terminating null character when sending string data; default is false
